abstract.t: This Internet-Draft describes congestion procedures applicable for bothM3UA [2] ASP and SG nodes. Draft explains all the procedures needed byM3UA [2] ASP and SG to handle local and network congestion communicatedbetween M3UA [2] SG and ASP through SSNM messages. Congestionprocedures proposed are in line with MTP3 Q.704 with some alteration tosuit sigtran architecture.
